entry.title: Combined summary - Lightning Network
entry.summary: Satoshi Nakamoto has praised the Lightning Network's ability to conduct global business through fast and secure lightning payments. He created a new lightning address, satoshi@vistomail.com, and applauded the network's capacity to process more transactions per second than any financial instrument. Bitcoin is seen as a major success and will continue to scale. However, concerns have been raised over Vistomail's recent change of ownership, leading Peter Todd to suggest blocking the entire domain from the list.
